title: 'Chunky' font suggestions needed!
content:
I am looking for any suggestions for a chunky font, which is similair in style to the linked image below, (however, it does not need to be rounded).

Any suggestions will be greatly appreciated!

[www.aisleone.net/wp-content/2008/01/baq.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.aisleone.net/wp-content/2008/01/baq.jpg "www.aisleone.net/wp-content/2008/01/baq.jpg")
author: mriera

comments.content:
[Black Boton Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/black_boton_bold/)  
 [Frank](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.neutura.org/Frank.html)  
 [Deuce](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.neutura.org/Deuce.html)  
 [Mostra Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/mark_simonson/mostra_blk_one_two_three/)  
 [Blocks](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/blocks/?sample_text=TOTALLY%20NU%20RAVE&sample_size=36)  
 [Alpha Bloc Sculpture](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/alpha_bloc_sculpture/)  
 [FF Extra](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_extra/)  
 [Unovis](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/paratype/unovis_regular_ot/)  
 [Neutrino](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.neutura.org/Neutrino.html)  
 [Toch](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/lamosca.com/)  
 [NB Block](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.neubauladen.com/catalogue/NB-Typografie/3/NBBlock%E2%84%A2/1310/1)  
 [Acton](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/device_fonts/acton/)  
 [Bebit](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.paratype.com/pstore/default.asp?fcode=TM_BBT&letter=B) (Cyrillic version of Milton Glaser's Baby Teeth)  
 [Parkitecture](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/parkitecture/regular/?refby=typographica)  
 [Wagner Silhouette](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/wagner-silhouette-nf/)  
 [Rody](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/discourse/rody/?refby=typographica) and [Lazar](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/discourse/lazar/?refby=typographica)  
 [Cooter](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=TTT0000015)  
 [Douff](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/2rebels/doufff/)  
 [Chumbitos](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fictilia/chumbitos/?refby=typographica)  
 [Mostra Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/mark_simonson/mostra_blk_one_two_three/)  
 [Kink](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.ths.nu/ths.php?p3=nav_typefaces&p4=rebel/works/fonts/kink.html)  
 [Ultrafat](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/Ultrafat)

Free  
 [Spokes](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/down10.com/fonts/spokes.html)  
 [Disco Deck](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=disco_deck)  
 [Pacmania Normal](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.abstractfonts.com/font/1580)  
 [Fatti Patti](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/casady_greene/d_h.htm) (lame version of Baby Teeth)  
 [Lovers Square](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.happyloverstown.eu/wordpress/)  
 [Pimp](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.formlos.net/formlosTF/Pimp)  
 [FS Pele](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.fontsmith.com/fonts.php?font_num=675)

Custom  
 [Non-Format](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.non-format.com/) created a bunch of these for their design work.

Soft and Round  
 [Deuce Round](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.neutura.org/DeuceRound.html)  
 [Copal](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/monotype/copal_std_ot/)  
 [NB Rund](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.neubauladen.com/catalogue/NB-Typography/3/NBFett%E2%84%A2/1044/1)  
 [Umma Gommma](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.happyloverstown.eu/wordpress/)  
 [Gusto](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/device_fonts/gusto/)  
 [Fatty](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.typetrust.com/fonts/font.php?id=MTIw)  
 [Milford](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/handel_sans_bold_oblique/?refby=typographica)  
 [Corpulent](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/suitcase/corpulent/?refby=typographica)  
 [Disco Fat](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.happyloverstown.eu/wordpress/?cat=1)  
 [BAQ Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.thinkdust.com/fonts/checkout.html)

Other Variations  
 [Sinaloa](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/sinaloa/)

[http://www.underconsideration.com/speakup/archives/atrochut\_levante\_02\_b...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.underconsideration.com/speakup/archives/atrochut_levante_02_big.jpg "http://www.underconsideration.com/speakup/archives/atrochut\_levante\_02\_big.jpg")  
 [http://www.juno.co.uk/covers/284770-01-front.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.juno.co.uk/covers/284770-01-front.htm "http://www.juno.co.uk/covers/284770-01-front.htm")  
 [http://www.non-format.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015013655/http:/www.non-format.com/ "http://www.non-format.com/")

Holy smokes!!! That is an incredible list! Thanks a lot - you have been a great help.

Megan
I guess I should just go ahead and turn it into a Typographica post now, but I don't know if I want to add fuel to the FAT FONT fire.
I would love to read that, Stephen. How about making a critical review of the trend?
